ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: Hi, I’m a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Augsburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
LOCATION_FLEXIBILITY: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Augsburg and remotely.
OPEN_MINDED: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
PROBLEM_SOLVING: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
SKILL_SET_DESCRIPTION: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
CONTACT_ME_PROMPT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
EXPLORE_WORK: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
JOIN_DETAILS: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
POLLO_DETAILS: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
PORTFOLIO_DETAILS: A portfolio website showcasing web development skills using Angular, TypeScript, SCSS, and HTML.
CONTACT_ME_FORM: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
NAME_MINLENGTH: The name must be at least 2 characters long.
EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Hello Hasan, I am interested in...
MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: The message must be at least 10 characters long.
AGREE_PROCESSING: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

CONTENT.TEXT1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 Abs.1 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we as service providers are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which knowledge of a specific infringement is obtained. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, we will remove the content immediately.

LEGAL_NOTICE_LINKS.TITLE: Liability for links
LEGAL_NOTICE_LINKS.TEXT1: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, the contents of which we have no influence on. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the sites is always responsible for the contents of the linked sites. The linked sites were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. No unlawful content was discernible at the time of linking.
LEGAL_NOTICE_LINKS.TEXT2: A permanent control of the content of the linked sites is, however, not reasonable without specific indications of a legal violation. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

LEGAL_NOTICE_COPYRIGHT.TITLE: Copyright
LEGAL_NOTICE_COPYRIGHT.TEXT1: The contents and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. The duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of these pages are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
LEGAL_NOTICE_COPYRIGHT.TEXT2: Insofar as the contents on this site were not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly.
